dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So, Kazhydromet just dropped the forecast for Astana and Almaty, and it's looking pretty mixed for the end of May.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Kazhydromet just dropped the forecast for Astana and Almaty, and it's looking pretty mixed for the end of May.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah? What's it say for May 30th?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah? What's it say for May thirtieth?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For Astana, partly cloudy, no rain, which is nice—highs around 26 to 28 degrees. A perfect spring day, really.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For Astana, partly cloudy, no rain, which is nice-highs around twenty six to twenty eight degrees. A perfect spring day, really.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: May 30: Partly cloudy, no precipitation expected. Nighttime temperatures will range from +10 to +12ÂC, daytime temperatures from +26 to +28ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But then it gets a little wild on May 31st, right? I think I saw something about thunderstorms.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then it gets a little wild on May thirty first, right? I think I saw something about thunderstorms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, thunderstorms expected during the day in both cities. And the wind picks up too, like 7 to 12 meters per second from the east.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, thunderstorms expected during the day in both cities. And the wind picks up too, like seven to twelve meters per second from the east.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: May 31: Partly cloudy, with rain expected during the day. Northeastern wind at 3"8 m/s.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oof, so maybe not the best day for outdoor plans unless you've got an umbrella handy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oof, so maybe not the best day for outdoor plans unless you've got an umbrella handy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And then June 1st continues with more rain and thunder—summer's coming in pretty wet for them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And then June first continues with more rain and thunder-summer's coming in pretty wet for them.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 1: Partly cloudy, with daytime rain and thunderstorms. June 1: Partly cloudy, with occasional rain and thunderstorms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I did notice Almaty's temps are a bit cooler though, like highs only around 20 to 23 on June 1st? That's a decent drop.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I did notice Almaty's temps are a bit cooler though, like highs only around twenty to twenty three on June first? That's a decent drop.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 1: Partly cloudy, with occasional rain and thunderstorms. Northeastern wind at 3"8 m/s. Night temperatures from +13 to +15ÂC, daytime from +20 to +22ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm, and the minister mentioned that some parts of the southwest might even hit 45 degrees later in the summer. Wild, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm, and the minister mentioned that some parts of the southwest might even hit forty five degrees later in the summer. Wild, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Minister of Ecology and Natural Resources Yerlan Nyssanbayev shared the weather forecast for the upcoming summer in Kazakhstan. In some parts of the southwest, temperatures could reach 45ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Forty-five? That is intense. Though at least rainfall seems about normal for June and July overall.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Forty-five? That is intense. Though at least rainfall seems about normal for June and July overall.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rainfall in June and July is expected to be within normal levels, though the north, south, and southeast may receive slightly more.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but August and September might be a bit drier and warmer than usual. We'll see how it's all shaping up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but August and September might be a bit drier and warmer than usual. We'll see how it's all shaping up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In August and September, less rainfall is expected, and temperatures may be about 1ÂC above normal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Always good to have a heads-up, even if it's preliminary.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Always good to have a heads-up, even if it's preliminary.
